Author: silvernikki
Text: It is, now that I've found something I like! But not during. I tried a lot of things that I hated and just made me even more upset, but I love boxing. It's not relaxing during the class, but I find that I'm less stressed, anxious, jumpy and irritable in the 1-2 days following.

Author: lovelylayout
Text: For me it depends on what kind of exercise. I can't exercise much anymore anyway (hypermobility) but I used to love less physical "exercise," stuff you'd really call more of an "activity," like bowling and mini golf and walking the dog and leisurely swimming. Intentional aerobic exercise is like a punishment for me. Try to find a way to move around or be outside that you actually enjoy for the thing of it, and maybe you'll eventually find that you're focusing more on the activity than on burning calories.
